Name: Doom
Bio:
He that burns and is not consumed, devours and is never sated, kills and is beyond all judgment--Lucifer brings doom to all who would stand against him. Bearing away souls on the tip of a fiery sword, he is the Fallen One, a once-favored general from the realm behind the light, cast out for the sin of defiance: he would not kneel. 

Six times his name was tolled from the great bell of Vashundol. Six and sixty times his wings were branded, until only smoking stumps remained. Without wings, he slipped loose from the tethers that bound him within the light and he fell screaming to earth. A crater in the desert, Paradise lost. Now he attacks without mercy, without motive, the only living being able to move freely between the seven dark dominions. Lashed by inescapable needs, twisted by unimaginable talents, Doom carries his own hell with him wherever he goes. Defiant to the last. Eventually, the world will belong to Doom.

Abilities.desc: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed.
Abilities.notes:
Gives Doom the original bounty of the creep, along with the bonus gold.
The amount of time it takes to Devour depends on the current HP of the unit.
Doom can't Devour mechanical or ancient units.
If you devour a creep without abilities, you'll keep the abilities you had previously.
Abilities.lore: Lucifer's appetite and greed are never sated.

Abilities.desc: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies and heal Doom, while also granting him increased movement speed.
Abilities.notes:
Scorched Earth follows Doom, centered on his location.
Other units Doom controls also benefit from Scorched Earth.
Abilities.lore: The Fallen One spreads destruction in his wake, sparing none from the flame which sustains him.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
Abilities.desc: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for 0.6 seconds and applies a 4 second burn that deals 25 + %burn_damage_pct%% of the target's Max HP as damage per second.
Abilities.attribute:
BASE BURN DAMAGE: 25 / 30 / 35 / 40
BURN DURATION: 4
STUN DURATION: 0.6
Abilities.lore: Lucifer shares the fire branding bestowed upon him at the time of his exile.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Pure
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
Abilities.desc:
Inflicts a curse that prevents an enemy Hero from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Abilities.notes: Units afflicted by Doom can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.
Abilities.attribute:
DURATION: 16
DURATION STOP RADIUS: 900DAMAGE PER SECOND: 25/40/55
Abilities.lore: When a name is tolled from the bell of Vashundol, doom is sure to follow.
